price: And He shows you His signs; so which of the signs of Allah will you deny?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
